SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM058', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F INNER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A ON F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE WHERE F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sAssetsCd#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sAssetsSubCd#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F INNER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A ON F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE WHERE F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'M'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sAssetsCd#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #sAssetsSubCd#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'

GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTY_NM , M.PRPOS , M.FMT , M.STNDRD , M.INSTL_DT , M.MFC_DT , M.MFC_CMPNY , M.MANAGER , M.USAGE_ENTRPS , M.LT , M.QY , M.UNIT , M.POSESN_MAINBD , M.RM , M.OPER_CMPNY , M.EQPMN_NO , M.ACQ_AMT , M.EXAM_BEGIN_DT , M.EXAM_END_DT , M.EXAM_OK_NO , M.EXAM_INSTT , M.LNL_ABLTY , M.SELF_LOAD , M.RATE_WGHT , M.MAX_WHEEL_WGHT , M.RAIL_ITV , M.RATE_HP , M.PROCESS_ABLTY , M.LOC , M.GDSNM , M.USAGE_BEGIN_DT , M.USAGE_END_DT , M.CAPA_TON , M.STRUCT_WQNT , M.STTUS_LVL , M.DRAFT , M.CNYEAR , M.USAGE_PURPS , M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = M.MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD) MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F INNER JOIN MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F M ON F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = M.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , PRPOS , FMT , STNDRD , INSTL_DT , MFC_DT , MFC_CMPNY , MANAGER , USAGE_ENTRPS , LT , QY , UNIT , POSESN_MAINBD , RM , OPER_CMPNY , EQPMN_NO , ACQ_AMT , EXAM_BEGIN_DT , EXAM_END_DT , EXAM_OK_NO , EXAM_INSTT , LNL_ABLTY , SELF_LOAD , RATE_WGHT , MAX_WHEEL_WGHT , RAIL_ITV , RATE_HP , PROCESS_ABLTY , LOC , GDSNM , USAGE_BEGIN_DT , USAGE_END_DT , CAPA_TON , STRUCT_WQNT , STTUS_LVL , DRAFT , CNYEAR , USAGE_PURPS , MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# || #gisAssetsCd# || #gisAssetsSubCd# || #gisPrtFcltyCd# || #gisPrtFcltySeq# || #prtFcltySe# , #archFcltsMngNo# , #prpos# , #fmt# , #stndrd# , TO_DATE(#instlDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#mfcDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #mfcCmpny# , #manager# , #usageEntrps# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ',', '')) , #unit# , #posesnMainbd# , #rm# , #operCmpny# , #eqpmnNo# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#acqAmt#, ',', '')) , TO_DATE(#examBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#examEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #examOkNo# , #examInstt# , #lnlAblty# , #selfLoad# , #rateWght# , #maxWheelWght# , #railItv# , #rateHp# , #processAblty# , #loc# , #gdsnm# , TO_DATE(#usageBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#usageEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #capaTon# , #structWqnt# , #sttusLvl# , #draft# , #cnyear# , #usagePurps# , #mechFcltsClCd# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MECH_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO = #archFcltsMngNo# , PRPOS = #prpos# , FMT = #fmt# , STNDRD = #stndrd# , INSTL_DT = TO_DATE(#instlDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , MFC_DT = TO_DATE(#mfcDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , MFC_CMPNY = #mfcCmpny# , MANAGER = #manager# , USAGE_ENTRPS = #usageEntrps# , LT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lt#, ',', '')) , QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ',', '')) , UNIT = #unit# , POSESN_MAINBD = #posesnMainbd# , RM = #rm# , OPER_CMPNY = #operCmpny# , EQPMN_NO = #eqpmnNo# , ACQ_AMT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#acqAmt#, ',', '')) , EXAM_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#examBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , EXAM_END_DT = TO_DATE(#examEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , EXAM_OK_NO = #examOkNo# , EXAM_INSTT = #examInstt# , LNL_ABLTY = #lnlAblty# , SELF_LOAD = #selfLoad# , RATE_WGHT = #rateWght# , MAX_WHEEL_WGHT = #maxWheelWght# , RAIL_ITV = #railItv# , RATE_HP = #rateHp# , PROCESS_ABLTY = #processAblty# , LOC = #loc# , GDSNM = #gdsnm# , USAGE_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#usageBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , USAGE_END_DT = TO_DATE(#usageEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , CAPA_TON = #capaTon# , STRUCT_WQNT = #structWqnt# , STTUS_LVL = #sttusLvl# , DRAFT = #draft# , CNYEAR = #cnyear# , USAGE_PURPS = #usagePurps# , MECH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #mechFcltsClCd# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , (CASE WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'D' THEN '문서' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'P' THEN '사진' WHEN ATCH_FILE_SE = 'Z' THEN '기타' END) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngNo# , TO_NUMBER(#maxAtchFileSeq#) , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , TO_DATE(#atchFileWritingDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = #atchFileWritingDt# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
